ABC's Of Australian Democracy

This is a series of articles explaining the basic structure of our democracy. How is the Prime Minister chosen? What does the senate do? This has the goal of making Australian democracy accessible to all.

You don't vote for the PM, but your vote will matter a lot in deciding who is sworn in.
